ingredients: 2 cups Almond Breeze Hint of Honey almondmilk, 1 cup green grapes, 2 cups packed baby kale, 1 large kiwi fruit, peeled and chopped, 1 (10 ounce) package frozen pineapple chunks
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 3%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 123mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 45g 17%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Protein 3g, Potassium 488mg 10%
